Description: Sought after water privileged community. Large corner lot open layout gracious rooms partial fenced yard and tree lined/wooded views. Herald Harbor Citizens Association membership is optional. Boat Ramp just off Eddy Rd. Community Park just off Kyle Rd. Minutes from Smith Marina Close to Rt.97 Annapolis & Rt.50. Also for Sale MLS#AA9974233

Description: Beautiful brand new open & airy home in a water privileged community! Kitchen with white maple cabinets granite counter tops a nice pantry refridgerator will be installed. Master bedroom with walk in closet & attached full bath. Mud room / laundry room off 1 car garage. Fenced yard & great location!

Description: Charming Contemporary this home offers complete privacy amidst a park like setting. Features include Water View of Maynadier Creek multiple decks leading to pool and hot tub Sauna Two fireplaces three car garage four bedrooms 3 1/2 baths. If the tenant would like a deep water slip the rent would be 3800. Good commute to Baltimore or DC. Home comes furnished or unfurnished.

Description: Beautiful Contemporary home nested on 4.5 acres overlooking the water. This home features wood floors vaulted ceilings updated kitchen three bedrooms and an office. Outside you will find multiple decks with a stone waterfall feature overlooking the water. Rental is for upper 2 levels of home. Separate basement apartment not included.

Description: Waterfront beautiful custom home for rent. Enjoy your own deep-water dock for your boating fishing and swimming pleasure. Best views on the Severn River. Five bedroom 5 bath custom home with open floor plan. Only 10 minutes to Annapolis 30 minutes to Washington DC and 25 minutes to Baltimore. Community beach with pavilion boat ramp and basketball courts. Private 1 acre wooded lot.

Description:
(240) 206-6044 x116 - A beautiful home with a view of the Severn River! This property is located in a very nice neighborhood that also has water privileges... This 2bdr, 2 bath home is nicely laid out and features a unique master bedroom and bath. There is a separate dining area with beautiful lighting in the living room. Nice yard space with fenced in backyard and a shed. Newly installed 60 gallons hot water heater, fairly new heat pump.. This won't last very long on the market! Please contact us for a viewing
(RLNE2216286) Other Amenities - Unfurnished, Parking, Smoke Free, Yard. Appliances - Dishwasher, Air Conditioning, Range, Washer & Dryer On-Site. Lease lengths - 12 Months, 24 Months. Details regarding this property's Utilities - Heat Included, Resident Pays Heat, Resident Pays Electricity, Resident Pays Gas, Resident Pays Water, Resident Pays Trash Pick-up. Pet policies - Other- Pets allowed for a fee of $250.
